description.translate: To you the eldest that killed so many beasts with its strokes.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Post-cataclysme\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Toi l'aînée dont les coups firent\"}","{\"text\":\"§7périr tant de bêtes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7To you the eldest that killed so\"}","{\"text\":\"§7many beasts with its strokes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§c-3 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
